title: Marvel Too Real, Trump Was Like REALLY Bad At His Job 11.8.21
itunes:title: Marvel Too Real, Trump Was Like REALLY Bad At His Job 11.8.21
description:
In episode 1025, Jack and guest co-host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Blair Socci to discuss What Zuckerberg's metaverse means to our humanity, FACEBOOK 'META' CHANGE Trademark Applicants Will Sell to Zuck FOR $20 MILLION!!!, Just In Case You’re Wondering Who’s On The Right Side Here: Vladimir Putin Is Worried About ‘Cancel Culture’, Former Adviser Says Trump Let Thousands Die of COVID for No Reason, Sitcom Premise Alert: Would You Become A Nudist For A Cheap Deal on A House? Prediction: Santa Claus Will Be the Next Pawn in the Vaccine Wars, Marvel’s Eternals Continues an Uncomfortable Blockbuster Trend and more!

  1. What Zuckerberg's metaverse means to our humanity
  2. FACEBOOK 'META' CHANGE Trademark Applicants Will Sell to Zuck FOR $20 MILLION!!!
  3. Just In Case You’re Wondering Who’s On The Right Side Here: Vladimir Putin Is Worried About ‘Cancel Culture’
  4. Former Adviser Says Trump Let Thousands Die of COVID for No Reason
  5. Select Subcommittee Releases Initial Findings From Transcribed Interview Of Dr. Deborah Birx
  6. Sitcom Premise Alert: Would You Become A Nudist For A Cheap Deal on A House?
  7. Prediction: Santa Claus Will Be the Next Pawn in the Vaccine Wars
  8. Covid vaccines for children are coming. So is misinformation
  9. Trump Official Planned to Give Santa Claus Performers Early Access to Covid-19 Vaccine
  10. Marvel’s Eternals Continues an Uncomfortable Blockbuster Trend
  11. Director Joe Russo Has a Gay Cameo Role in Avengers: Endgame
  12. Did Eternals Really Blame Hiroshima on the MCU's First Gay Hero?
  13. LISTEN: Fafo - Zack Fox

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
